title: Regulation (EEC) No 1699/75 of the Commission of 2 July 1975 amending Commission Regulation No 27 of 3 May 1962
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 1699/75 OF THE COMMISSION  of 2 July 1975  amending Commission Regulation No 27 (1) of 3 May 1962
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 2 (1) of Regulation No 27 is amended as follows:
"10 copies of each application and notification and of the supporting documents shall be submitted to the Commission."
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 July 1975.
For the Commission
The President
François-Xavier ORTOLI  (1)OJ No 35, 10.5.1962, p. 1118/62, as amended by Regulation (EEC) No 1133/68 of 26 July 1968 (OJ No L 189, 1.8.1968, p. 1). (2)OJ No 13, 21.2.1962, p. 204/62.
